reviewText: So blessed to have found these 6 beautifully inspiring DVDs to be able to share with family and friends.  When I saw it was distributed by Questar, I knew we would want to add it to our collection even though we already had the "Amazing Grace" disc we purchased a number of years ago.

This is one of the most endearing collections of Christian videos I have seen. There is a balanced combination of music and biblical teaching to keep one entertained, soothed, and informed for a long time. God bless you and thank you. Karen
